name: æ
description:
Strange shapes and voices pierce the blizzard's veil, stranded and curious atop this mountain you leave behind the comforts of your cabin to survey this darkest of nights. A disconcerting pseudohorror walking journey through noisecore purgatories Study the 5 glyphs of silence and cross the dead river with Wōden... Warning! Bad vibes & highly grating audio visual content with flashing imagery and headache inducing tones! wasd: move | mouse: look | esc: menu music, art and programming by @colorfiction

*Warning! It’s probably very boring and confusing, with absolutely nothing to actually do or accomplish beyond looking at some weird stuff
